items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
non_functional: Feed updates within 2 seconds of posting

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow and unfollow other users without approval

notes: The requirement is high-level and does not specify detailed fitness tracking features; assumptions made that core tracking functionality exists and social features are an add-on.
